title: Emerald Bloom Jhumka: Timeless Elegance with a Modern Touch
materials: and Pearls. Showcasing intricate Hyderabadi craftsmanship with a durable build. Excellent finish and polish guarantee lasting brilliance.
features: Classic Jhumka design, featuring a cascading floral motif with intricate filigree work. The dome-shaped jhumka is embellished with sparkling CZ stones. Teardrop emerald centerpiece adds a touch of sophistication. Enhanced by lustrous hanging pearls, embodying the traditional Telugu aesthetic.
colors: accented by a vibrant green emerald and creamy white pearls.
occasions: festive celebrations like Diwali and Sankranti
and traditional occasions like seemantham (సీమంతం) and half-saree functions. Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to modern outfits.
description: These Emerald Bloom Jhumkas seamlessly blend traditional design with contemporary appeal. The combination of CZ stones, emerald, and pearls creates a dazzling effect. Crafted with precision and care, these jhumkas offer a touch of luxury and cultural richness. A timeless piece that can be cherished for generations. Lightweight and comfortable for extended wear.
